name: Daydream Simulator
description:
A mouse version of a piece of software originally written for the LeapMotion! In its full iteration, the visual is shown via a short-throw projector and controlled via a motion sensor on the projector. 

Sound is a big part of this! Headphones encouraged - I wrote original music for this that responds to user input.

I've also included the original LeapMotion code - one of the files will be labeled "daydreamleap" and one will be "daydreammouse". If you have a Leap, please check out the original!
